title: Why does Dissonance not work with Manaless Champions?
body:
For some reason, Athene's Unholy Grail's passive "Dissonance" does not give Ability power for % Base Mana Regen on champions without Mana.
(Mordekaiser, Shen, Katarina, Etc.)

I'm not sure if this is intended or not, would be great to hear back from a developer about this.

replies.body: also they have 0 mana regen /5 so the % increase would just result in them still having 0 mana/5
Does archangels give them AP though?
Probably because _why would you ever build it on manaless champions?_
